content: All CI for Cargo is currently failing due to new deprecations in clap 3.1.0. Fix in <https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/10396>.

Should we allow deprecation warnings in CI? cargo doesn't have a lock file and so any dependency update can cause CI to turn red and make things more difficult for people contributing PRs or reviewing PRs.
Arguably, we should use a lock file in CI, and separately run a CI pass without a lock file that isn't treated as a blocker.
